api yuddhayen samayata, akaryakshama bawen karyakshama bawata, apirisudukamin pirisudukamata, nodiyunukamin sanwardhanayata, wahalkamen niwahalkamata gaman karannemu. 2014 pebarawari 4 wanida kagalle di sakakaruwan 94k mudal samanga athadanguwe polisiyen aluth wadapiliwelak meheyumata aawe siwil andumen nawa pannaye sudu polata athuluwimata rupiyal 3000k kolambaa, pitakotuwa oolkot mawatha saha palamu haras widiye pawathwagena giya hora sudu pola pahak watala sakakaruwan 94 denaku rupiyal laksha thunaka mudal samangin athadanguwata ganimata polisiya samath wa atha.
